TerrainDef.label: fine ironwood floor
TerrainDef.description: Fine ironwood flooring. Great care and time is put into making these fine floors. Fit for the highest Royals.

value.description: Sow cocoa plants to create your own delicious chocolate. Eating chocolate fulfills the need for recreation, and it's valuable on the market too. \n\nUnlocks Trees and Bushes.

RecipeDef.label: brew mango soda
RecipeDef.description: Brew mangoes and syrup into a sweet soda.

RecipeDef.label: brew kiwi soda
RecipeDef.description: Brew kiwi and syrup into a sweet soda.

RecipeDef.label: make biosolids fertilizer
RecipeDef.description: Make biosolids fertilizer from fecal sludge and soil.

RecipeDef.label: make fertilizer from fecal sludge
RecipeDef.description: Make garden fertilizer from fecal sludge and soil.

value.description: A drug for preventing infections before they take hold. Blocks malaria, sleeping sickness, plague. Works in animals. Must be taken every five days to remain effective.\n\nThis drug only prevents new infections. It does not cure existing infections - even those that are not yet discovered.
